title: Apress Sharepoint Users Guide Leaming Microsofts Business Collab
description:
<--( RELEASE )--------------------------------------------------------------->
TITLE........: SHAREPOINT 2013 USER'S GUIDE: LEAMING MICROSOFT'S BUSINESS
               COLLABORATION PLATFORM, 4TH EDITION

PUBLISHER....: APRESS                    -  LANGUAGE......: ENGLISH
LINK.........: http://www.apress.com/9781430248330
RELEASE TYPE..: RETAIL        
FORMAT.......: PDF                       -  RELEASE DATE..: 2013/08/03    
ISBN.........: 9781430248347             -  STORE DATE....: 2013      
AUTHOR.......: ANTHONY SMITH             -  DISKS.........: 11

SAVED MONEY..: 28 DOLLAR

<--( BOOK )------------------------------------------------------------------->
Microsoft SharePoint 2013 provides a collection of tools and services you can 
use to improve user and team productivity, make information sharing more 
effective, and facilitate business decision-making processes. In order to get 
the most out of SharePoint 2013, you need to understand how to best use the 
capabilities to support your information management, collaboration, and 
business process management needs. The SharePoint 2013 User's Guide is 
designed to provide you with the information you need to effectively use 
these tools. 

Whether you are using SharePoint as an intranet or business solution platform, 
you will learn how to use the resources (such as lists, libraries, and sites) 
and services (such as search, workflow, and social) that make up these 
environments. In the fourth edition of this bestselling book, author Tony 
Smith walks you through the components and capabilities that make up a 
SharePoint 2013 environment. He provides step-by-step instructions for using 
and managing these elements, as well as recommendations for how to best 
leverage them. 

The author has brought together this information based on his extensive 
experience working with these tools and with business users who effectively 
leverage these technologies within their organizations. These real-world 
experiences were incorporated into the writing of this book to make it easy 
for you to gain the knowledge you need to make the most of the product. Pick 
up a copy of the SharePoint 2013 User's Guide today.
